jvminsight.description: Ask questions about your JVM using MCP. See [here](https://github.com/quarkiverse/quarkus-mcp-servers/tree/main/jvminsight)

kubernetes.description: Interact with your Kubernetes cluster using MCP. See [here](https://github.com/quarkiverse/quarkus-mcp-servers/tree/main/kubernetes)

containers.description: Start, stop, and inspect containers using MCP. See [here](https://github.com/quarkiverse/quarkus-mcp-servers/tree/main/containers)

filesystem.description: Interact with your filesystem using MCP. See [here](https://github.com/quarkiverse/quarkus-mcp-servers/tree/main/filesystem)

jdbc.description: Access any JDBC database using MCP. See [here](https://github.com/quarkiverse/quarkus-mcp-servers/tree/main/jdbc)

wildfly.description: Interact with your WildFly server using MCP. See [here](https://github.com/wildfly-extras/wildfly-mcp/tree/main/wildfly-mcp-server)
